review.title: harD pagk
review.content: NOW THAT YOU'RE HANGIN' WITH THE PACK WE NEED A MINUTE OF YOUR TIME.
opinion: I THINK THE HARD PACK IS SMOOTH
review.interview: I DON'T GIVE INTERVIEWS, SPEAK TO MY AGENT. (BUT I DO LOVE THE T-SHIRT)
review.additional_comment: SOMETHING ELSE TO SAY? GOOD PROMOS - BUT DON'T SEND THE GOOD STUFF TO MY KIDS
